title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that teaches clean coding practices.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: A guide to programming best practices with timeless principles for software developers.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Practical strategies for building good habits, breaking bad ones, and mastering small behaviors for success.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel exploring surveillance, freedom, and totalitarianism.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: An exploration of human history, evolution, and culture from the Stone Age to modern civilization.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A science classic exploring cosmology, black holes, and the nature of the universe.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Rules and practices for focused success in a distracted world.
